mapper.select: SELECT C_Name FROM COMPANY WHERE C_STATE =0

select apde.*, s.s_name, s.t_name, c.c_name, ap.ap_date, c.c_no, c.c_username from apde apde join s s on apde.s_no = s.s_no join ap ap on apde.ap_no = ap.ap_no and apde.ap_b_no = ap.ap_b_no join c c on c.c_username = ap.c_username where ap.ap_state = 0 and c.c_name = #{c_name} order by apde.ap_b_no , apde.apde_turn
SELECT H.AP_NO, H.AP_B_NO, C.C_NAME, H.AP_DATE FROM APPLY_BUS_HISTORY H JOIN COMPANY C ON H.C_USERNAME=C.C_USERNAME WHERE H.AP_STATE=0 ORDER BY H.AP_NO

SELECT H.AP_NO, H.AP_B_NO, C.C_NAME, H.AP_DATE, HD.AP_NO, HD.APDE_TURN, S.S_NO, S.S_NAME, S.T_NAME FROM APPLY_BUS_HISTORY H JOIN COMPANY C ON H.C_USERNAME=C.C_USERNAME JOIN APPLY_BUS_HISTORY_DETAIL HD ON H.AP_NO=HD.AP_NO AND HD.AP_B_NO = H.AP_B_NO JOIN STOP S ON HD.S_NO=S.S_NO WHERE H.AP_NO=#{ap_no} AND H.AP_STATE=0 ORDER BY HD.AP_B_NO, HD.APDE_TURN
SELECT H.AP_NO, H.AP_B_NO, C.C_NAME, H.AP_DATE FROM APPLY_BUS_HISTORY H JOIN COMPANY C ON H.C_USERNAME=C.C_USERNAME WHERE H.AP_STATE=3 ORDER BY H.AP_NO

SELECT H.AP_NO, H.AP_B_NO, C.C_NAME, H.AP_DATE, HD.AP_NO, HD.APDE_TURN, S.S_NO, S.S_NAME, S.T_NAME FROM APPLY_BUS_HISTORY H JOIN COMPANY C ON H.C_USERNAME=C.C_USERNAME JOIN APPLY_BUS_HISTORY_DETAIL HD ON H.AP_NO=HD.AP_NO AND HD.AP_B_NO = H.AP_B_NO JOIN STOP S ON HD.S_NO=S.S_NO WHERE H.AP_NO=#{ap_no} AND H.AP_STATE=3 ORDER BY HD.AP_B_NO, HD.APDE_TURN
SELECT C.C_NAME, H.AP_B_NO FROM COMPANY C, APPLY_BUS_HISTORY H WHERE C.C_USERNAME=H.C_USERNAME AND C.C_NAME=#{c_name}

SELECT HD.APDE_TURN, HD.S_NO, S.S_NAME, S.T_NAME FROM COMPANY C, APPLY_BUS_HISTORY H, APPLY_BUS_HISTORY_DETAIL HD, STOP S WHERE C.C_USERNAME=H.C_USERNAME AND H.AP_NO=HD.AP_NO AND HD.S_NO=S.S_NO AND H.AP_B_NO=#{ap_b_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMPANY SET C_STATE=1 WHERE C_NAME=#{c_name}
UPDATE COMPANY SET C_STATE=2 WHERE C_NAME=#{c_name}
mapper.select: SELECT C.C_NAME, C.C_NO, (select count(*) as v_count FROM VOC V JOIN COMPANY C ON C.C_USERNAME=V.C_USERNAME WHERE C.C_NAME = #{c_name}) FROM COMPANY C JOIN VOC V ON C.C_USERNAME=V.C_USERNAME WHERE C.C_NAME = #{c_name}
SELECT C.C_NAME, H.AP_DATE FROM COMPANY C JOIN APPLY_BUS_HISTORY H ON C.C_USERNAME = H.C_USERNAME WHERE H.AP_STATE = 1 OR H.AP_STATE = 3
SELECT C.C_NAME, H.AP_DATE FROM COMPANY C JOIN APPLY_BUS_HISTORY H ON C.C_USERNAME = H.C_USERNAME WHERE H.AP_STATE = 2
